mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.`name`,u.salt,u.`password`,u.position,u.email,u.office_id,u.state , r.`code` AS role, o.`code` AS permission FROM `user` AS u INNER JOIN user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.use_id LEFT JOIN role AS r ON ur.rol_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_operation ro ON r.id = ro.rol_id LEFT JOIN operation o ON ro.ope_id = o.id WHERE u.email = #{email} AND u.is_deleted = b'0' OR u.is_deleted = null AND ur.is_deleted = b'0' OR ur.is_deleted = null AND r.is_deleted = b'0' OR r.is_deleted = null AND ro.is_deleted = b'0' OR ro.is_deleted = null AND o.is_deleted = b'0' OR o.is_deleted = null
